title: Task
description: Schema for task documents in Firestore

completed.description: Status indicating whether the task has been completed.

created.description: The timestamp representing when the task was created in Firestore.

details.description: Additional information or notes about the task.

title.description: The title or short description of the task.

user.description: Reference path to the user document associated with this task (e.g., '/users/{uid}').
